Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 43rd overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off Christopher Engstrom (NY)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/3/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2015, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2016, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 4/26/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
